alert.note: Alert for Lake; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 9:17PM EST until February 01 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Iroquois River near Foresman affecting Newton County. Vermilion River near Leonore affecting La Salle County. Fox River at Dayton affecting La Salle County. Kankakee River at Momence affecting Kankakee County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Indiana... Iroquois River at Iroquois affecting Iroquois and Newton Counties. Kankakee River at Shelby affecting Lake IN and Newton Counties. For the Fox River (Illinois)...including Algonquin Lock & Dam tailwater, Montgomery, Dayton...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kankakee River from Near I-65 and De Motte downstream to IL/IN state line, including the Shelby gauge. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.5 feet, Water overflows low-lying river banks along Bluegrass Road and in Wildwood Estates east of Sumava Resorts. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday afternoon to a crest of 10.9 feet Monday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: A Flood Warning means water levels above flood stage are imminent or may already be occurring. Persons along rivers and streams in the warned area should take immediate precautions to protect life and property. Report flooding to the National Weather Service or your local law enforcement agency only when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued bySunday afternoon at 230 PM CST.
